typography.description: Each level should be at least 1.25x larger than the next

zPattern.description: Visual content follows Z-pattern (top-left to top-right to bottom-left to bottom-right)

gutenbergDiagram.description: Natural reading gravity - top-left (primary) to bottom-right (terminal)

prompts.goldenRatioAnalysis: Analyze this layout for golden ratio (φ = 1.618) compliance. Evaluate: 1) Content area proportions 2) Whitespace distribution 3) Element size relationships 4) Focal point placement 5) Overall mathematical harmony. Provide specific measurements and improvement suggestions.
prompts.gridSystemAnalysis: Evaluate this 12-column grid layout. Check: 1) Column alignment accuracy 2) Gutter width consistency (20pt target) 3) Baseline grid adherence (8pt) 4) Element snapping quality 5) Grid violations with coordinates. Rate grid usage professionalism.
prompts.hierarchyAnalysis: Assess visual hierarchy clarity. Examine: 1) Size progression (H1 > H2 > H3 > body) 2) Color emphasis and contrast 3) Spatial relationships 4) Eye flow patterns (F/Z/Gutenberg) 5) Hierarchy effectiveness. Suggest improvements for clarity.
prompts.spacingAnalysis: Analyze spacing consistency and rhythm. Evaluate: 1) Margin uniformity (40pt target) 2) Element spacing (20pt target) 3) Section breaks (60pt target) 4) Paragraph spacing (12pt target) 5) Anomalies and outliers. Recommend optimal spacing scale.
prompts.alignmentAnalysis: Critique alignment precision (±2px tolerance). Check: 1) Edge alignments 2) Center alignments 3) Baseline rhythm 4) Vertical/horizontal consistency 5) Misalignment patterns. Identify all alignment violations.
prompts.balanceAnalysis: Evaluate visual balance and weight distribution. Analyze: 1) Left vs right balance 2) Top vs bottom balance 3) Symmetry vs asymmetry 4) Color weight 5) Density distribution. Calculate balance score and suggest equilibrium improvements.
prompts.proximityAnalysis: Assess proximity and grouping using Gestalt principles. Check: 1) Related element proximity 2) Logical grouping 3) Similarity patterns 4) Continuity 5) Figure-ground separation. Identify grouping logic issues.
prompts.professionalAssessment: Provide comprehensive professional layout assessment. Rate against: 1) Industry best practices 2) Award-winning patterns 3) Common mistakes 4) Layout complexity 5) Overall sophistication. Grade A+ to F with detailed justification.

parallel.description: Run AI model calls in parallel when possible
